block_comment: The block functions as a 3-to-8 line binary decoder implemented with a case statement in Verilog, used to assign different values to the variable "compute_input_tm_cnt" based on the value of "switch_for_mux". The implementation uses a control line "switch_for_mux" to select specific cases. Depending on the case value, a specific binary value is assigned to "compute_input_tm_cnt". The control line ranges from '000' to '111', and each has a unique corresponding binary output.
